cards.name: Roaming Wolfpack
cards.text: Intimidate. No attachments. While Roaming Wolfpack is attacking, each attacking Direwolf character gets +2 STR.
cards.flavor: She was strong and swift and fierce, and her pack was all around her, her brothers and her sisters.

cards.name: The North Remembers
cards.text: Challenges Action: Each player sacrifices a character or location. Reaction: After a character you control is killed, pay 1 gold to return The North Remembers from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Elinor Tyrell
cards.text: You may marshal or play 1 additional limited card each round.
cards.flavor: Megga was round and loud, Alla shy and pretty, but Elinor ruled the three by right of womanhood...

cards.name: Silver Hair Net
cards.text: Lady character only. Attached character gains stealth. While attached character is participating in a challenge, reduce the cost of each event you play by 1.

cards.name: Recruiter for the Watch
cards.text: You may choose not to stand Recruiter for the Watch during the standing phase. Marshaling Action: Kneel Recruiter for the Watch to choose a character with printed cost 2 or lower. Take control of that character until Recruiter for the Watch stands or leaves play.

cards.name: Underground Vault
cards.text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Underground Vault to gain 1 gold. (2 gold instead if the gold value on an opponent's revealed plot card is 5 or higher.)

cards.name: Flea Bottom Bastard
cards.text: During the dominance phase, Flea Bottom Bastard gets +3 STR.
cards.flavor: The Bottom had a stench to it, a stink of pigsties and stables and tanner's sheds, mixed in with the sour smell of winesinks and cheap whorehouses.

cards.name: Spears of the Merling King
cards.text: Interrupt: When a character you control is killed, sacrifice Spears of the Merling King to return that character to your hand instead of placing it in your dead pile.
cards.flavor: ...for every one that broke the surface, a dozen lurked treacherously just below it. Any captain with sense kept his course well away from them.

cards.name: Cersei's Attendant
cards.text: While Cersei's Attendant is participating in a challenge against an opponent with no cards in his or her hand, Cersei's Attendant gains insight.

cards.name: Fever Dreams
cards.text: Opponent's character only. Bestow (3). Reaction: After attached character is knelt, discard 1 gold from Fever Dreams to draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Theon Greyjoy
cards.text: While Theon Greyjoy is attacking alone, each character with a higher STR than his does not contribute its STR to the challenge.
cards.flavor: "A dead enemy is a thing of beauty."

cards.name: Corsair's Dirk
cards.text: Ironborn character only. Attached character gets +2 STR. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is attacking, move 1 gold from the losing opponent's gold pool to your own.

cards.name: Grey Worm
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Action: During a challenge in which Grey Worm is attacking, choose a defending character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets -3 STR. (Limit once per challenge.)

cards.name: Astapor
cards.text: Bestow (4). Action: Kneel Astapor to choose a participating character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets -X STR. X is the number of gold Astapor has.

cards.name: Maester of Sunspear
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Maester of Sunspear is participating, choose an attachment and return it to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Dornish Fiefdom
cards.text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Dornish Fiefdom to gain 1 gold. (2 gold instead if you are not the first player.)

cards.name: Frey Lordling
cards.text: Reaction: After you initiate a challenge, Frey Lordling gets +1 STR until the end of the phase.

cards.name: The Twins
cards.text: During the third challenge you initiate each phase, if you control an attacking House Frey character, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.

cards.name: Lay Siege
cards.text: Action: Choose and kneel a location. Then, if that location is Contested, discard it from play.

cards.name: Duel
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose an opponent. That player chooses 2 non-Army characters, each with printed cost 6 or higher. Then, that player chooses and kneels 1 of those characters. Kill the other (cannot be saved).
cards.designer: Card design by 2014 North American Champion, Jonathan Andrews.
